TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaElement extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle

summary.span: 將來自 XML 結構描述的 項目依 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規定表示。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 這個類別是所有物件類型的基底類別，並且用於描述 XML 文件中的元素。

span.span: This class is the base class for all particle types and is used to describe an element in an XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿使用從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來會危及您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊;不接受這些未受信任的案例中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 請小心，不要公開 （expose） 給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. ## Examples 下列範例會建立`element`項目。The following example creates the `element` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CPP/element.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CS/element.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/VB/element.vb#1)] 下列 XML 檔案用於上述程式碼範例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Block { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 衍生。

span.span: Gets or sets a derivation.

value.span: 用於阻斷類型衍生的屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The attribute used to block a type derivation.
Default value is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以包含下列值：This attribute can contain the following values: |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用所定義的衍生限制`BlockDefault`屬性結構描述，若有的話。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|沒有任何限制，在這個項目的替代項目。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|由替代衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|利用擴充衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|無法取代此項目，由限制所衍生的型別。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 任何類型，不論衍生方法無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| 此屬性不會防止衍生，但可以避免衍生項取代執行個體中的型別。This property does not prevent derivation, but prevents derivation from replacing the type in an instance. 清單和聯集的值不支援`block`屬性。List and union values are not supported for the `block` property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 屬性的編譯後值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value of the property.
The post-compilation value of the property.

value.span: 預設值為 項目上的 值。

span.span: The default is the value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值指示在執行個體文件中使用 `xsi:type` 時，如何強制型別。This value indicates how the type is enforced when `xsi:type` is used in the instance document. 比方說，如果有限制的值，就可以使用只有特定的定義的類型，不是型別限制所衍生的特定定義的型別。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specific defined type can be used, not types derived by restriction from the specific defined type. 這個屬性可以包含下表中顯示的值。This property can contain the values shown in the following table. 預設值為 `None`。The default is `None`. 這個屬性上不允許清單和聯集衍生方法。List and union derivation methods are not allowed on this property. |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Empty`|沒有任何限制，在這個項目的替代項目。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|由替代衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|利用擴充衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|無法取代此項目，由限制所衍生的型別。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 任何類型，不論衍生方法無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.|

span.span: Gets the collection of constraints on the element.
The collection of constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回集合的項目上的條件約束。Returns a collection of constraints on the element. 可以是任一`XmlSchemaKey`， `XmlSchemaKeyref`，或`XmlSchemaUnique`。Can be any of `XmlSchemaKey`, `XmlSchemaKeyref`, or `XmlSchemaUnique`.

The default value for the element.

value.span: 預設值為 Null 參考。

span.span: The default is a null reference.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fixed` 和 `default` 屬性互為獨佔模式。The `fixed` and `default` attributes are mutually exclusive. 如果項目包含簡單型別，則此值必須是該型別的有效值。If the element contains a simple type, this value must be a valid value of that type.

An object.

The common language runtime object.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以是如果項目具有內建的 XML 結構描述型別或在項目具有使用者定義型別。The object can be if the element has a built-in XML Schema type or if the element has a user-defined type. 這個屬性是後結構描述驗證資訊集屬性。This property is a post-schema-validation infoset property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性是在.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代屬性。The property is obsolete in the 2.0 version of the .NET Framework and has been replaced by the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性，表示不允許進一步的衍生。

span.span: Gets or sets the property to indicate that no further derivations are allowed.
The property.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以包含下表中顯示的值。This attribute can contain the values shown in the following table. |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用所定義的衍生限制`FinalDefault`屬性結構描述，若有的話。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `FinalDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|沒有這個項目的衍生限制。There are no restrictions on derivations of this element.| |`Extension`|這個項目不能由延伸模組衍生。This element cannot be derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|這個項目不能由限制衍生。This element cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 這個項目不能由衍生的任何方法衍生。This element cannot be derived by any derivation method.| 請參閱 。See also . `Substitution``List`，和`Union`衍生方法不可用於這個屬性。`Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not allowed for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值表示型別有何限制時透過限制擴充型別。This value indicates how the type is restricted when the type is extended through restriction. 這個屬性可以包含下列值。This property can contain the following values. |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Empty`|沒有這個項目的衍生限制。There are no restrictions on derivations of this element.| |`Extension`|這個項目不能由延伸模組衍生。This element cannot be derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|這個項目不能由限制衍生。This element cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 這個項目不能由衍生的任何方法衍生。This element cannot be derived by any derivation method.| 替代、 清單和聯集衍生方法不可用於這個屬性。Substitution, List, and Union derivation methods are not allowed for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是值`elementFormDefault`屬性`schema`元素，其中包含項目。The default value is the value of the `elementFormDefault` attribute for the `schema` element containing the element. 預設為 `Unqualified`。The default is `Unqualified`. |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Qualified`|項目必須限定命名空間前置詞。Element must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| |`Unqualified`|不需要命名空間前置詞限定項目。Element is not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 無法設定值，如果包含的項目是`schema`項目。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element.
The name of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 命名空間規格中所定義，名稱必須是 NCName （無冒號名稱）。The name must be an NCName (no-colon name) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. `Name` 和`RefName`屬性互斥。`Name` and `RefName` attributes are mutually exclusive.

summary.span: 取得指定元素的實際限定名稱。

span.span: Gets the actual qualified name for the given element.
The qualified name of the element.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的名稱，`ref`屬性參考。 is the name that a `ref` attribute refers to. 限定的名稱所組成的項目 NCName。The qualified name consists of the NCName of the element. 例如，項目名稱 ="NCName 」，以及用來描述的前置詞`targetNamespace`的結構描述。For example, element name = "NCName", and the prefix used to describe the `targetNamespace` of the schema. 此屬性會保留的編譯後值`QualifiedName`屬性。This property holds the post-compilation value of the `QualifiedName` property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定在這個結構描述 (或指定的命名空間指示的其他結構描述) 中宣告的元素的參考名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the reference name of an element declared in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The reference name of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RefName`必須是 QName。The `RefName` must be a QName. `RefName`可以包含命名空間前置詞。The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix. 如果`RefName`屬性已存在，所有`complexType`， `simpleType`， `key`， `keyref`， `unique`， `nillable`， `default`， `fixed`， `form`， `block`，及`type`必須是不存在。If `RefName` attribute is present, all `complexType`, `simpleType`, `key`, `keyref`, `unique`, `nillable`, `default`, `fixed`, `form`, `block`, and `type` must be absent. 如果`RefName`的話`minOccurs`， `maxOccurs`，和`id`允許。If `RefName` is present, `minOccurs`, `maxOccurs`, and `id` are allowed. 若要宣告使用現有的項目定義的項目，請使用`RefName`屬性來指定現有的項目定義。To declare an element using an existing element definition, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the existing element definition. 無法設定值，如果包含的項目是`schema`項目。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

The type of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要宣告使用現有的項目`simpleType`或是`complexType`定義，請使用`SchemaType`屬性來指定現有的類型。To declare an element using an existing `simpleType` or `complexType` definition, use the `SchemaType` property to specify the existing type. 如果`RefName`屬性，就`complexType`， `simpleType`， `key`， `keyref`，和`unique`元素和`nillable`， `default`， `fixed`， `form`， `block`，以及`SchemaType`屬性不能有。If `RefName` attribute is present, `complexType`, `simpleType`, `key`, `keyref`, and `unique` elements and `nillable`, `default`, `fixed`, `form`, `block`, and `SchemaType` attributes cannot be present.

summary.span: 取得或設定由這個元素取代的元素的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an element that is being substituted by this element.

value.span: 由這個項元素取代之元素的限定名稱。

span.span: The qualified name of an element that is being substituted by this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個項目的型別必須和指定項目的型別相同，或者是從該項目型別衍生的型別。This element must have the same type or a type derived from the type of the specified element. 這個值必須是 QName。This value must be a QName. 無法設定值，如果包含的項目是`schema`項目。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.
